channel.title: Unicode on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log
channel.description: Recent content in Unicode on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log

item.title: What I learned in 2015-12-01
item.description: MYSQL Index is useless when use function on indexed field Reality, if using function on indexed field, you will broke indexing by accident. Eg: WHERE MONTH(`date`) = 11 AND YEAR(`date`) = 2015 Solution is transform the query to comparison query, like this : WHERE `date` >= '2015-11-01' AND `date` < '2015-12-01' PYTHON String Format Unicode params unicode_thing = u"Xin chào mọi người" a = '{}'.format(unicode_thing) will cause the error UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\xe0' in position 6: ordinal not in range(128)
